solidify verb [I or T]
(NOT LIQUID/GAS)
to change from being a liquid or gas to a solid form, or to make something do this: Molten volcanic lava solidifies as it cools. The chemical reaction solidifies the resin.

solidify verb [I or T]
(CERTAIN)
